    • Properties

      public Properties()
      Default constructor for the `Properties` class. Initializes default values for properties.

    • Properties

      public Properties(String sourceOfLight, String interFace, String opticalSystem, String photogetter, int resolutionDPI, boolean isDuplex)
      Constructor for the `Properties` class with specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      sourceOfLight - The light source of the scanner.
      interFace - The interface of the scanner.
      opticalSystem - The optical system of the scanner.
      photogetter - The photogetter of the scanner.
      resolutionDPI - The resolution (DPI) of the scanner.
      isDuplex - Indicates whether the scanner supports duplex scanning.

      public boolean isDuplex()
      Checks if the scanner supports duplex scanning.
      Returns:
